# Upstage

Use `upstage/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "upstage-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "upstage/solar-mini",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `UPSTAGE_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.upstage.ai/v1/solar`

You can override the base URL by setting `UPSTAGE_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://developers.upstage.ai/docs/apis/chat

## Models

<details>
  <summary>Show models (3)</summary>

- solar-mini
- solar-pro2
- solar-pro3

</details>
